entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening and ending before morning. Fog patches overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
